Megatron's audiotry circuitry managed to emit a short sound, "Noo---
". The shearing white blade of immesurable energy slammed into his 
large dragonlike robot form. His armour and bits of his inner 
circuitry were quickly destroyed as the blast ripped into him. The 
bot was thrown backwards a good 50 feet and the final fall tore his 
torso in two. All that could be seen of Megatron was a charred 
severly damaged heap of slag, consisting only of Megatron's general 
form. Lucky for the Predacon leader, the weapon didn't stay focused 
on him for very long, and it hit him below his spark, so it still 
survived.
